messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: I live in Northamptonshire and served as a Councillor for 8 years. I actively campaigned for Brexit, which presents great opportunities and will give us back control, including over our borders. The Tory candidate not only voted for remain but, as the Times reported, his website until recently was still promoting Project Fear – saying that leaving the EU would only embolden Putin and threaten “our economic security”. I believe in our country and in delivering a clean Brexit. Yours sincerely, Jonathan Bullock

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May completely failed to control immigration as Home Secretary and since she’s been in government net migration has risen by more than 1.8 million people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Wasting Your Money on Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: She is fully committed to pledging £14 billion a year of your money on so-called foreign ‘aid’.
The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and terrorists and even makes us pay them compensation.
She won’t commit to protecting our fishermen from future Brussels controls.
Since 2010, May’s Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees. This money should have employed tens of thousands of nurses and carers in our NHS.
Police have been cut by 20,000 officers and armed forces by 30,000 since 2010.
